titleStmt.title: Adrasta: or, The vvomans spleene, and loves conquest A tragi-comedie. Never acted.
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, fl. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher?] for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivie-lane, next to the Exchequer Office,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Ivie-lane, next to the Exchequer Office
